あまりにも.meaning: too much; so much… that; excessively ~

ばよかった.meaning: should have; would have been better if ~

ば.*のに.meaning: would have; should have; if only ~

ばかりでなく.meaning: not only... but also; as well as ~

べきではない.meaning: should not do; must not do ~

ぶりに.meaning: for the first time in (period of time)

中.meaning: currently; during; at some point; throughout; before the end of ~

だらけ.meaning: full of; covered with; a lot of (something undesirable)

どうしても.meaning: no matter what; at any cost; after all ~

ふりをする.meaning: to pretend; to act as if ~

がち.meaning: tend to; tendency to; frequently; often; to do something easily

一体.meaning: emphasis; what on earth; what in the world

じゃない.meaning: maybe; most likely; confirmation of information; express surprise towards listener

かける.meaning: half-; not yet finished; in the middle of~

代わりに.meaning: instead of; as a substitute for​; in exchange for; in return for

結局.meaning: after all; eventually; in the end ~

切れない.meaning: unable to do; too much to finish/complete

切る.meaning: to do something completely to the end

っけ.meaning: a casual suffix to confirm something you are trying to remember

込む.meaning: to do something for a long time or to move something inside

こそ.meaning: for sure (emphasize preceding word); precisely; definitely ~

ことになっている.meaning: expresses a standard, rule or expectation

ことはない.meaning: there is no need to; (something) never happens; there is no possibility that ~

くらい.meaning: approximately; about; around; to the extent ~

ぐらい.meaning: approximately; about; around; to the extent ~

くせに.meaning: and yet; though; in spite of; despite ~

まるで.meaning: as if; as though; just like ~

まさか.meaning: there's no way; that's impossible; you must be joking

も.*ば.*も.meaning: and; also; as well; either/or; neither/nor

もしかしたら.meaning: perhaps; maybe; perchance; by any chance ~

ないことはない.meaning: can do; is not impossible to ~

なかなか.meaning: very; quite; pretty; rather; just not ~

なんか.meaning: give examples; show modesty; make light of ~

なんて.meaning: give examples; show modesty; make light of ~

など.meaning: give examples; show modesty; make light of ~

直す.meaning: to do something again; to do over

なぜなら.meaning: because; the reason is; if you want to know why

に違いない.meaning: I’m sure/ certain; no doubt that ~

にかわって.meaning: instead of; replacing; on behalf of ~

にかわり.meaning: instead of; replacing; on behalf of ~

において.meaning: in; at (place); regarding; as for; in relation to ~

にしても.meaning: even if; even though; regardless of ~

にとって.meaning: to; for; concerning; as far as ... is concerned; regarding ~

につれて.meaning: as; in proportion to; with; as… then ~

には.meaning: for the purpose of; in order to ~

によって.meaning: by means of; due to; owing to; because of ~

による.meaning: by means of; due to; owing to; because of ~

のでしょうか.meaning: ask a question in a polite way

おかげで.meaning: thanks to; owing to; because of ~

っぱなし.meaning: leaving (something) on; leaving (something) still in use​

っぽい.meaning: seems like; somewhat; -ish; easily does; often does ~

さえ.meaning: even; so much as; not even

際に.meaning: when; at the time of; in the case of ~

最中に.meaning: while; during; in the middle of ~

せいで.meaning: because of; due to; as a result of ~

せいぜい.meaning: at the most; at best; to the utmost

しばらく.meaning: for a moment; for a while; for the time being

そのために.meaning: hence; for that reason; because of ~

そうもない.meaning: very unlikely to; showing no signs of ~

そうにない.meaning: very unlikely to; showing no signs of ~

すでに.meaning: something has already been done/taken place; is already the case

たものだ.meaning: used to do; would often do

ために.meaning: for; in order to; for the benefit of; because of; as a result of ~

たて.meaning: just done; freshly done; newly done

たって.meaning: even if; even though; no matter how ~

てはじめて.meaning: not until; only after [x] did I

てからでないと.meaning: must first do; cannot do without first doing ~

て済む.meaning: sufficient by; no problem to; resolve by ~

てはいけないから.meaning: in order to not~; to prevent a negative situation

ている場合じゃない.meaning: this is no time to be doing ~

的.meaning: change noun into na-adjective or adverb

ても始まらない.meaning: even if you... it’s no use; there is no point to ~

てもしょうがない.meaning: there's no point to~; it's no use to~; it cannot be helped

てもしかたがない.meaning: there's no point to~; it's no use to~; it cannot be helped

と言えば.meaning: speaking of; when you talk of; when you say; if it were the case that ~

といい.meaning: it would be nice if; should; I hope ~

たらいい.meaning: it would be nice if; should; I hope ~

といっても.meaning: although I say; although one might say ~

ということだ.meaning: I heard; it means that; in other words ~

というのは.meaning: this means; the meaning of … is; because; that is to say ~

というと.meaning: speaking of; when you talk of; when you say ~

とすれば.meaning: in the case of~; assuming~; if A then B

としたら.meaning: in the case of~; assuming~; if A then B

とすると.meaning: in the case of~; assuming~; if A then B

と共に.meaning: together with; at the same time as; as well as ~

途中で.meaning: on the way; in the middle of ~

とおりに.meaning: in the same way as; in the way; as ~

とは限らない.meaning: not necessarily so; is not always true

ついでに.meaning: while, incidentally, at the same time, on the way ~

つまり.meaning: in other words; in summary; in short ~

つもりだった.meaning: I thought I~; I believe I~; was planning to~; was intending to ~

上で.meaning: upon; after; when; for; in order to

上に.meaning: as well; besides; in addition to; not only… but also ~

は別として.meaning: aside from; apart from; except for; whether or not ~

はもちろん.meaning: not to mention; not only ... but also ~

わけだ.meaning: for that reason; no wonder; as you’d expect; the fact is; so you mean ~

わけがない.meaning: there is no way that; it is impossible to ~

わけにはいかない.meaning: must not; cannot afford to; must, have no choice but to ~

わざわざ.meaning: to go to the trouble of; to go out of one's way to ~

よりも.meaning: in comparison to; rather than; more than ~

ようがない.meaning: there is no way to; it’s impossible to ~

ような気がする.meaning: have a feeling that; feels like; seems like; think that ~

ように見える.meaning: to look; to seem; to appear ~

ようとしない.meaning: not try to; not make an effort to ~

ようとする.meaning: try to; attempt to; be about to ~

ずにはいられない.meaning: can’t help but feel; can’t help but do; must do ~

.*ために.meaning: For the sake of; because of

.*ようになる.meaning: Come to be able to; start to
